title: Donut Dog App 🍩🐶
description: Deleting social networking, news or chat apps does not have to be the solution for you to keep you focused on your work. When you need to get a task done, open the Donut Dog App, select how long you want to focus and start being productive. The donut machine generates donuts as long as you keep on focusing. If you change or close the app the machine will stop and the session will end.
